name: dustindowell.neon
title: Neon
description: Neon theme for Brackets. Themed MiniMap, Code Folding and CSS Color Preview. NOTICE: As of version 1.1.4, Neon is a theme that acts like an extension in order to theme specific parts of other extensions. In your theme prefrences select 'Brackets Light (Default)' and reload Brackets (ctrl/cmd + r).
author: Dustin Dowell (https://github.com/dustindowell22)
